org.grandviewtech.entity.bo.Routine.name: SUBSTRACTION WITH ONE CONSTANT DATA
org.grandviewtech.entity.bo.Routine.functionalBlock: MOV A,#0E8H ; LSD OF CONSTANT DATA MOV TEMP,A MOV DPTR,#D2006L ;DATA A MOVX A,@DPTR CLR C SUBB A, TEMP MOV DPTR,#D2008L ;RESULT MOVX @DPTR,A MOV A,#03H ;MSD OF CONSTANT DATA MOV TEMP,,A MOV DPTR,#D2006H MOVX A,@DPTR SUBB A,TEMP MOV DPTR,#D2008H ;RESULT MOVX @DPTR,A MOV DPTR,#RLY512_519+ MOVX A,@DPTR MOV RLY517,C ;CARRY BIT MOVX @DPTR,A
